synopsis: Specials for Kimetsu no Yaiba. They were originally shown at a live event in 2019 with the cast doing a live dubbing. They were later released on DVD / Blu-Ray in 2020 with a new dub.

title.en: Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Demon's Banquet Special Arc
title.jp: Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Kimetsu no Utage Tokubetsu-hen
